name: devtrend-inblog
description: Public Devtrend inblog site backed by Notion API

scripts.build: mkdir -p public && for f in index.html admin.html admin-login.html styles.css admin.css script.js admin.js admin-login.js favicon.ico robots.txt; do if [ -f "$f" ]; then cp -f "$f" public/; fi; done && echo "Prepared public output"
